Package com.vtls.opensource.vital.architecture

Class Summary
Action An abstraction of a 'page' in the framework.
ActionThread  
ApplicationMapSingleton  
ArchitectureFilter A servlet Filter that presets attributes in the HttpServletRequest instance for common objects required by the framework.
ArchitectureServlet A common HttpServlet class that parses the requested URL and delivers the Action object matching the package name.
Link A class used to store a URI, initially designed for use in Velocity but with a number of uses elsewhere.
ThreadedAction
